item.description:
From the Felt website...

:: $3 appetizers, $3 entrees, $3 desserts ::
:: upbeat, fun music to help you through the week ::
:: delicious cocktails by belvedere ::
:: pitchers of sangria ::
:: A new FUN theme every week (see below) ::


June 3 :: SUMMER. For the beach bums, surfer girls & any woman who enjoys the well-deserved warm weather, tonight is for you. Our friends at Glas Apparel are giving away amazing prizes throughout the night! And we’re not talking key chains—we’re talking about flip-flops, sundresses, shirts & the kind of hats you’ll actually wear. Tonight we’re also featuring FUZE in our cocktails. Looks like we’re going to have a tasty time tonight!

Check out the event website at: http://www.feltclubbo...
item.name: Female Feature at Felt Boston - cheap food and free stuff!
